flavorText:
"It triggers the hive's period of aetheric fertility—a time when even feeding is a lower priority than reproduction."
—Rukarumel, field journal

foreignData.flavorText:

—Rukarumel, Tagebucheintrag

Alle Remasuris haben „Wenn diese bleibende Karte ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte."

foreignData.flavorText:
"Dispara el período de fertilidad etérica de la colmena; una época en la cual incluso alimentarse es menos prioritario que la reproducción".
—Rúkarumel, diario de investigación

foreignData.flavorText:
« Il déclenche la période de fertilité éthérique de l'essaim — un temps où même se nourrir devient secondaire à se reproduire. »
—Rukarumel, journal de recherches
foreignData.name: Slivoïde assoupi

foreignData.flavorText:
"Innesca il periodo di fertilità eterea dell'alveare: un periodo in cui perfino nutrirsi è meno importante della riproduzione."
—Rukarumel, registro delle attività

――ルカルメルの観察日誌
foreignData.name: 休眠スリヴァー

foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

— полевой журнал Рукарумеля

name: Dormant Sliver
originalText:
All Sliver creatures have defender.
All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, draw a card."

rulings.text: Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.
The last ability Dormant Sliver grants itself triggers when it enters the battlefield.
The controller of the Sliver that enters the battlefield draws a card, not necessarily the controller of Dormant Sliver.

text:
All Sliver creatures have defender.
All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, draw a card."
